name: Effective date
text:
ARTICLE 11.
EFFECTIVE DATE AND TRANSITION PROVISIONS--1978
AMENDATORY ACT
 
Revision Note
 
  "1978 Amendatory Act" was added
for clarification
purposes.
 
     §490:11-101  Effective
date.  This Act
shall become
effective at 12:01 A.M. on
July 1,
1979. [L
1978, c
155, pt
of §1(34)]
